snippet: Also, sales of the Sunday edition of Rupert Murdoch's Sun tabloid have yet to match The News of the World's circulation figures; and Anthony Bourdain moves to CNN.
abstract: Also, sales of the Sunday edition of Rupert Murdoch's Sun tabloid have yet to match The News of the World's circulation figures; and Anthony Bourdain moves to CNN.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Less-Than-Daily Newspapers, and Richard Dawson's Kisses
